languages.text: На корабле Вольного Торговца в космических сражениях используется 6 постов, отвечающих за управление основными системами судна. При развитии судна можно выбирать новые способности постов. У каждого поста есть две обычные способности, которые можно использовать каждый ход, но только по одной на каждом посту и со случайным {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}временем восстановления{/g}.

While controlling the Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} in combat, a total of 6 posts, representing various ship systems, are available for you to manage. As you level up your ship, you can select new abilities that your posts can use. Each post can have up to two basic abilities. These can be used each round, but they have a random {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} time and each post can only activate one of its abilities per round.
languages.original_text: На корабле Вольного Торговца в космических сражениях используется 6 постов, отвечающих за управление основными системами судна. При развитии судна можно выбирать новые способности постов. У каждого поста есть две обычные способности, которые можно использовать каждый ход, но только по одной на каждом посту и со случайным {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}временем восстановления{/g}.

traits.locale_text: While controlling the Rogue Trader's flagship in combat, a total of 6 posts representing various ship systems are available for you to manage. As you level up your ship, you can select new abilities that your posts can use. Each post can have up to two basic abilities. These can be used each round, but they have a random cooldown time and each post can only activate one of its abilities per round.

While controlling the Rogue Trader's flagship in combat, a total of 6 posts representing various ship systems are available for you to manage. As you level up your ship, you can select new abilities that your posts can use. Each post can have up to two basic abilities. These can be used each round, but they have a random cooldown time and each post can only activate one of its abilities per round.

While controlling the Rogue Trader's flagship in combat, a total of 6 posts, representing various ship systems, are available for you to manage. As you level up your ship, you can select new abilities that your posts can use. Each post can have up to two basic abilities. These can be used each round, but they have a random cooldown time and each post can only activate one of its abilities per round.

While controlling the Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} in combat, a total of 6 posts, representing various ship systems, are available for you to manage. As you level up your ship, you can select new abilities that your posts can use. Each post can have up to two basic abilities. These can be used each round, but they have a random {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} time and each post can only activate one of its abilities per round.

While controlling the Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} in combat, a total of 6 posts, representing various ship systems, are available for you to manage. As you level up your ship, you can select new abilities that your posts can use. Each post can have up to two basic abilities. These can be used each round, but they have a random {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} time and each post can only activate one of its abilities per round.

languages.text: Beim Kontrollieren des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} des Freihändlers im Kampf sind insgesamt 6 Posten zum Verwalten verfügbar. Diese repräsentieren verschiedene Schiffssysteme. Steigt dein Schiff in der Stufe auf, kannst du neue Fähigkeiten auswählen, die deine Posten nutzen können. Jeder Posten kann bis zu zwei Basisfähigkeiten haben. Diese können jede Runde verwendet werden, haben jedoch eine zufällige {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} und jeder Posten kann pro Runde nur eine seiner Fähigkeiten aktivieren.
languages.original_text: While controlling the Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} in combat, a total of 6 posts, representing various ship systems, are available for you to manage. As you level up your ship, you can select new abilities that your posts can use. Each post can have up to two basic abilities. These can be used each round, but they have a random {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} time and each post can only activate one of its abilities per round.

traits.locale_text: Beim Kontrollieren des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} des Freihändlers im Kampf sind insgesamt 6 Posten zum Verwalten verfügbar. Diese repräsentieren verschiedene Schiffssysteme. Steigt dein Schiff {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}in der Stufe auf{/g}, kannst du neue {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} auswählen, die deine Posten nutzen können. Jeder {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}Posten{/g} kann bis zu zwei Basisfähigkeiten haben. Diese können jede {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} verwendet werden, haben jedoch eine zufällige {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} und jeder Posten kann pro Runde nur eine seiner Fähigkeiten aktivieren.

languages.text: Lorsque vous contrôlez le {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} du libre-marchand au combat, un total de 6 postes, représentant différents systèmes de bord, sont à votre disposition. Au fur et à mesure que vous améliorez votre vaisseau, vous pouvez doter vos postes de nouvelles capacités. Chaque poste peut disposer d'un maximum de deux capacités de base. Ces capacités peuvent être utilisées à chaque round, mais elles ont un {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}temps de recharge{/g} aléatoire et chaque poste ne peut activer qu'une seule de ses capacités par round.
languages.original_text: While controlling the Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} in combat, a total of 6 posts, representing various ship systems, are available for you to manage. As you level up your ship, you can select new abilities that your posts can use. Each post can have up to two basic abilities. These can be used each round, but they have a random {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} time and each post can only activate one of its abilities per round.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque vous contrôlez le {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} du Libre-Marchand au combat, un total de 6 postes, représentant différents systèmes de bord, sont à votre disposition. Au fur et à mesure que vous {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}améliorez{/g} votre vaisseau, vous pouvez doter vos postes de nouvelles {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g}. Chaque {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}poste{/g} peut disposer d'un maximum de deux capacités de base. Ces capacités peuvent être utilisées à chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, mais elles ont un délai de {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}récupération{/g} aléatoire et chaque poste ne peut activer qu'une seule de ses capacités par round.

languages.text: 当您在战斗中操纵行商浪人的{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}时，旗舰一共有6个职位，代表旗舰的不同系统，供您使用。当您升级虚空舰时，您可以为这些职位选择新的能力。每个职位最多可以拥有两个基本能力。这些能力可以在每轮中使用，但每个能力的{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}是随机的，而且每个职位每轮只能使用一个技能。
languages.original_text: While controlling the Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} in combat, a total of 6 posts, representing various ship systems, are available for you to manage. As you level up your ship, you can select new abilities that your posts can use. Each post can have up to two basic abilities. These can be used each round, but they have a random {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} time and each post can only activate one of its abilities per round.

traits.locale_text: 当您在战斗中操纵行商浪人的{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}时，旗舰一共有6个职位，代表旗舰的不同系统，供您使用。当您{g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}升级{/g}虚空舰时，您可以为这些职位选择新的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。每个{g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}职位{/g}最多可以拥有两个基本能力。这些能力可以在每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中使用，但每个能力的{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}是随机的，而且每个职位每轮只能使用一个技能。

languages.text: Al controlar la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} de tu Comerciante Independiente en combate, podrás gestionar un total de 6 puestos que representan distintos sistemas de la nave. A medida que subas de nivel a tu nave, podrás seleccionar capacidades nuevas para tus puestos. Todos los puestos pueden tener hasta dos capacidades básicas. Estas se pueden usar en cada asalto, pero cuentan con un {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g} aleatorio y un límite de uso de una capacidad por asalto.
languages.original_text: While controlling the Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} in combat, a total of 6 posts, representing various ship systems, are available for you to manage. As you level up your ship, you can select new abilities that your posts can use. Each post can have up to two basic abilities. These can be used each round, but they have a random {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} time and each post can only activate one of its abilities per round.

traits.locale_text: Al controlar la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} de tu Comerciante Independiente en combate, podrás gestionar un total de 6 puestos que representan distintos sistemas de la nave. A medida que {g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}subas de nivel{/g} a tu nave, podrás seleccionar {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} nuevas para tus puestos. Todos los {g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}puestos{/g} pueden tener hasta dos capacidades básicas. Estas se pueden usar en cada {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, pero cuentan con un {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g} aleatorio y un límite de uso de una capacidad por asalto.

languages.original_text: In space battles, the ship of the Free Merchant uses 6 posts responsible for controlling the main systems of the ship. As the ship evolves, you can choose new abilities for the posts. Each post has two regular abilities that can be used each turn, but only one per post and with a random recovery time.

languages.text: 戦闘中にローグトレーダーの{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}を制御している間、船の様々なシステムを示す6つのポストが指揮可能となる。船のレベルが上がるとポストで使用可能な新しいアビリティを選択することができる。各ポスト最大2つまで基本アビリティを所持できる。アビリティは各ラウンドで使用可能だが、{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}タイムがランダムに発生する。また、各ポストのアビリティは各ラウンドにつきアクティブな方のみ使用することができる。
languages.original_text: While controlling the Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} in combat, a total of 6 posts, representing various ship systems, are available for you to manage. As you level up your ship, you can select new abilities that your posts can use. Each post can have up to two basic abilities. These can be used each round, but they have a random {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} time and each post can only activate one of its abilities per round.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘中にローグトレーダーの{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}を制御している間、船の様々なシステムを示す6つのポストが指揮可能となる。船の{g|Encyclopedia:CharacterLevel}レベルが上がる{/g}とポストで使用可能な新しい{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を選択することができる。各{g|Encyclopedia:PostSpace}ポスト{/g}最大2つまで基本アビリティを所持できる。アビリティは各{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で使用可能だが、{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}タイムがランダムに発生する。また、各ポストのアビリティは各ラウンドにつきアクティブな方のみ使用することができる。

languages.text: Çatışmada Hür Tacir'in {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}sancak gemisini{/g} yönetirken elinin altında, geminin farklı sistemlerini temsil eden toplamda 6 mevki bulunur. Gemin seviye kazandıkça, bu mevkilerin kullanabileceği yeni kabiliyetler seçebilirsin. Her bir mevki en fazla iki temel kabiliyete sahip olabilir. Bunları her rauntta kullanmak mümkün olsa da rastgele {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}dolum süreleri{/g} bulunur ve her bir mevki, bir rauntta kabiliyetlerinden yalnızca birini etkinleştirebilir.
languages.original_text: While controlling the Rogue Trader's {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} in combat, a total of 6 posts, representing various ship systems, are available for you to manage. As you level up your ship, you can select new abilities that your posts can use. Each post can have up to two basic abilities. These can be used each round, but they have a random {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} time and each post can only activate one of its abilities per round.
